text: Description: Create a command that installs Claude Code hooks to remind agents about Grove. Hooks: 1) SessionStart - show grove status, 2) PreToolUse - intercept direct dev server commands and suggest grove start, 3) PreToolUse - intercept git worktree add and suggest grove new, 4) Stop - remind about updating docs when code changed.
Close reason: Implemented grove hooks install/uninstall commands
